name: The rise of LK: Gangster's Paradise (DEMO eng)
name_original: The rise of LK: Gangster's Paradise (DEMO eng)
description:
The head of the area was assassinated. Now the most powerful gangsters want to leave the position vacant, to whoever can pay it, unleashing a difficult fight for control.

Join your teammates to raise the money you need and claim your rightful place.
Steal, traffic, torture, murder, put your morals aside and do whatever it takes to achieve your goal.
Now in an English version!
